column6: Item's value will most likely not change, if it does, it
wouldn't be a major change
Item's value is fluxuating, may end up increasing
or decreasing
Item is on track to lose a significant amount of its
value
Item is on track to gain a significant amount of
value
Most demandable items, very easy to trade and get
overpays for
Items with good demand, likely wont have trouble
getting a good deal for it
Item has reasonable demand, not heavily sought
after but could still get a fair trade
Item has bad demand, nobody really looks for it
and it will likely be underpaid for
Temporary value, for items that have little to no owners
and are likely not in circulation
Items with basically not value, exclusive to admins
and will probably never be traded
